SEARCH
Package gw.api.admin

Interface PublicZoneFinder

public interface PublicZoneFinder
Finder for zones. Some of these methods go against the cache others search the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IQueryBeanResult<Zone>
    findAdminZones()
    Find all admin zones.
    Set<Country>
    findLoadedCountries()
    Find countries with zone data.
    Zone
    findZone(ZoneKey key)
    Finds the zone that belongs to the specified key, if the key is invalid it will just return null.
    Zone
    findZone(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, String zoneCode)
    Finds the zone that belongs to the specified country and is of the specified type and zoneCode.
    String[]
    findZoneCodes(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, Zone linkedZone)
    Find all zones that are part of the given country and have the specified zone type The zones returned are ordered by zone code.
    IQueryBeanResult<Zone>
    findZones(Country country, ZoneType zoneType)
    Find all zones that are part of the given country and have the specified zone type.
    IQueryBeanResult<Zone>
    findZones(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, String[] zoneCodes)
    Find all zones that are part of the given country and have the specified zone type and zone code.
    IQueryBeanResult<Zone>
    findZones(Country linkedCountry, ZoneType linkedZoneType, String linkedZoneCode, ZoneType zoneType)
    Finds zones that are linked to the zone specified by (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType.
    IQueryBeanResult<Zone>
    findZones(Country linkedCountry, ZoneType linkedZoneType, String linkedZoneCode, ZoneType zoneType, String zoneNameStartsWith)
    Finds zones that are linked to the specified zone (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType and whose name starts with zoneNameStartsWith.
    IQueryBeanResult<Zone>
    findZonesByCode(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, String zoneCode, boolean startsWith)
    This uses the database.
    IQueryBeanResult<Zone>
    findZonesByName(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, String zoneName, boolean startsWith)
    Find all zones that are linked to zones that match the criteria of (country, zoneType, zoneName) This uses the database.

    findZonesByName(Country linkedCountry, ZoneType linkedZoneType, String linkedZoneName, ZoneType zoneType)
    Finds zones that are linked to the zone specified by (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType.

    findZonesInAllCountries(ZoneType zoneType, String[] zoneCodes)

    default List<Country>
    getAllCountriesThatHaveZonesDefined()
    A list of all countries that have zones defined.
    default ZoneType
    getOrgZoneTypeForCountry(Country country)
    Returns the org zone type for the country.
    default List<ZoneType>
    getZoneTypesOrderedByGranularity(Country country)
    Get the zone types ordered by granularity, with the smallest granularity first.
    default List<ZoneType>
    getZoneTypesOrderedByRegionOrder(Country country)
    Get the zone types ordered by region order.
    boolean
    hasLink(Country country, ZoneType linkedZoneType, String linkedZoneCode, ZoneType zoneType, String zoneCode)
    Returns true if there are zones that are linked to the specified zone (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType and whose type is zoneType and whose code is zoneCode This uses the database.

  • Method Details

    • findAdminZones

      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findAdminZones()
      Find all admin zones. Goes against database.
      Returns:
      all the zones that are admin zones

    • findLoadedCountries

      Set<Country> findLoadedCountries()
      Find countries with zone data. Goes against the database.
      Returns:
      all the Countries that had zone data in the database

    • findZone

      Zone findZone(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, String zoneCode)
      Finds the zone that belongs to the specified country and is of the specified type and zoneCode. There should be 0 or 1. If there is more than one, there will be an exception thrown. This uses the cache not the database.
      Parameters:
      country - the country
      zoneType - the zone type
      zoneCode - the string zone code
      Returns:
      the zone if found, null otherwise

    • findZone

      Zone findZone(ZoneKey key)
      Finds the zone that belongs to the specified key, if the key is invalid it will just return null. There should be 0 or 1. If there is more than one, there will be an exception thrown. This uses the cache not the database.
      Parameters:
      key - the ZoneKey
      Returns:
      the zone if key is valid and found

    • findZoneCodes

      String[] findZoneCodes(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, Zone linkedZone)
      Find all zones that are part of the given country and have the specified zone type The zones returned are ordered by zone code. This uses the database.
      Parameters:
      country - the country
      zoneType - the zone type
      linkedZone - the returned zone codes are linked to this zone, can be null.
      Returns:
      an array of zone codes

    • findZones

      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZones(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, String[] zoneCodes)
      Find all zones that are part of the given country and have the specified zone type and zone code. The zones returned are ordered by zone code. This uses the database.
      Parameters:
      country - the country
      zoneType - the zone type
      zoneCodes - the zone codes
      Returns:
      all the zones that match the zone codes

    • findZonesInAllCountries

      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesInAllCountries(ZoneType zoneType, String[] zoneCodes)
      Find all zones that have the specified zone type and zone code. The zones returned are ordered by zone code. This uses the database.
      Parameters:
      zoneType - the zone type
      zoneCodes - the zone codes
      Returns:
      all the zones that match the zone codes

    • findZonesByName

      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesByName(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, String zoneName, boolean startsWith)
      Find all zones that are linked to zones that match the criteria of (country, zoneType, zoneName) This uses the database.
      Parameters:
      country - the country
      zoneType - the zone type
      zoneName - the zone name
      startsWith - if true, the match on zone name is a partial match, otherwise, it is an exact match.
      Returns:
      a QueryProcessor of Zone entities ordered by zone name

    • findZonesByCode

      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesByCode(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, String zoneCode, boolean startsWith)
      This uses the database.
      Parameters:
      country - the country
      zoneType - the zone type
      zoneCode - the zone code
      startsWith - if true, the match on zone code is a partial match, otherwise, it is an exact match.
      Returns:
      a QueryProcessor of Zone entities ordered by zone code

    • findZones

      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZones(Country country, ZoneType zoneType)
      Find all zones that are part of the given country and have the specified zone type. The zones returned are ordered by zone code. This uses the database.
      Parameters:
      country - the country
      zoneType - the zone type
      Returns:
      QueryProcessor of Zone entities, ordered by zone code

    • findZones

      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZones(Country linkedCountry, ZoneType linkedZoneType, String linkedZoneCode, ZoneType zoneType)
      Finds zones that are linked to the zone specified by (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType. This uses the database.
      Parameters:
      linkedCountry - the linkedCountry, cannot be null.
      linkedZoneType - the zone type, cannot be null.
      linkedZoneCode - the zone code, cannot be null.
      zoneType - the returned zones are of this type, can be null.
      Returns:
      QueryProcessor of Zone entities, ordered by zone code.

    • findZonesByName

      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesByName(Country linkedCountry, ZoneType linkedZoneType, String linkedZoneName, ZoneType zoneType)
      Finds zones that are linked to the zone specified by (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType. This uses the database.
      Parameters:
      linkedCountry - the linkedCountry, cannot be null.
      linkedZoneType - the zone type, cannot be null.
      linkedZoneName - the zone name, cannot be null.
      zoneType - the returned zones are of this type, can be null.
      Returns:
      QueryProcessor of Zone entities, ordered by zone code.

    • findZones

      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZones(Country linkedCountry, ZoneType linkedZoneType, String linkedZoneCode, ZoneType zoneType, String zoneNameStartsWith)
      Finds zones that are linked to the specified zone (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType and whose name starts with zoneNameStartsWith. The zones returned are ordered by zone code. This uses the database.
      Parameters:
      linkedCountry - the linkedCountry, cannot be null.
      linkedZoneType - the zone type, cannot be null.
      linkedZoneCode - the zone code, cannot be null.
      zoneType - the returned zones are of this type, can be null.
      zoneNameStartsWith - the returned zones' names start with this value; this can be null in which case there is no restriction on the returned zones' names
      Returns:
      QueryProcessor of Zone entities, ordered by zone code.

    • findZonesByName

      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesByName(Country linkedCountry, ZoneType linkedZoneType, String linkedZoneName, ZoneType zoneType, String zoneNameStartsWith)
      Finds zones that are linked to the specified zone (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType and whose name starts with zoneNameStartsWith. The zones returned are ordered by zone code. This uses the database.
      Parameters:
      linkedCountry - the linkedCountry, cannot be null.
      linkedZoneType - the zone type, cannot be null.
      linkedZoneName - the zone name, cannot be null.
      zoneType - the returned zones are of this type, can be null.
      zoneNameStartsWith - the returned zones' names start with this value; this can be null in which case there is no restriction on the returned zones' names
      Returns:
      QueryProcessor of Zone entities, ordered by zone code.

    • hasLink

      boolean hasLink(Country country, ZoneType linkedZoneType, String linkedZoneCode, ZoneType zoneType, String zoneCode)
      Returns true if there are zones that are linked to the specified zone (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType and whose type is zoneType and whose code is zoneCode This uses the database.
      Parameters:
      country - the country for determining the link.
      linkedZoneType - the zone type, cannot be null.
      linkedZoneCode - the zone code, cannot be null.
      zoneType - the returned zones are of this type, can be null.
      zoneCode - the returned zone codes are of this type, can be null.
      Returns:
      QueryProcessor of Zone entities, ordered by zone code.

    • getZoneTypesOrderedByRegionOrder

      default List<ZoneType> getZoneTypesOrderedByRegionOrder(Country country)
      Get the zone types ordered by region order. Those zone types that do not specify a region order are not included in the list.
      Parameters:
      country - the country
      Returns:
      a list of ZoneTypes in order of the region order.

    • getAllCountriesThatHaveZonesDefined

      default List<Country> getAllCountriesThatHaveZonesDefined()
      A list of all countries that have zones defined.
      Returns:
      list of all countries that have zones defined

    • getZoneTypesOrderedByGranularity

      default List<ZoneType> getZoneTypesOrderedByGranularity(Country country)
      Get the zone types ordered by granularity, with the smallest granularity first. Those zone types that do not specify a granularity are not included in the list.
      Parameters:
      country - the country
      Returns:
      a list of ZoneTypes in order of the granularity, with smallest granularity first.

    • getOrgZoneTypeForCountry

      default ZoneType getOrgZoneTypeForCountry(Country country)
      Returns the org zone type for the country.
      Parameters:
      country - the country
      Returns:
      the zoneType that is the admin zone on the country
